mapper.select: SELECT /* com.plgrim.ncp.base.selectSysMobileAppVer Generator(Generator) 2018-05-23 */ APP_SECT_CD , APP_VER , MALL_ID , OPSTM_NM , PCKAGE_NM , APP_UDT_APL_DT , APP_ENFRC_UDT_YN , APP_DSCR , REGTR_ID , REG_DT , UDTER_ID , UDT_DT FROM SYS_MOBILE_APP_VER WHERE 1 = 1 AND APP_SECT_CD = #{appSectCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND APP_VER = #{appVer,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
